# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(blockstore-libs-endpoints_grpc)
target_link_libraries(blockstore-libs-endpoints_grpc PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  public-api-protos
  blockstore-libs-client
  blockstore-libs-common
  blockstore-libs-diagnostics
  blockstore-libs-endpoints
  blockstore-libs-server
  blockstore-libs-service
  storage-core-libs-uds
)
target_sources(blockstore-libs-endpoints_grpc PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/cloud/blockstore/libs/endpoints_grpc/socket_endpoint_listener.cpp
)
